head.title: An Updated Interior As Sleek as a Seal

hedline.hl1: An Updated Interior As Sleek as a Seal

abstract.p: Stylishly relaminated interior of 1948 Wanderer travel trailer is on view at International Contemporary Furniture Fair at Javits Convention Center; photo (Circuits) (S)

block.p: Sleek postwar Airstreams notwithstanding, travel trailers usually suggest a lack of means and class. Jim Huff of Inside Design of New York, a product development company, says 20-somethings want more style than typical models offer. Inside Design joined with Wilsonart International, a Texas-based laminates manufacturer, and Christopher Deam, a San Francisco-based architect, to revamp a vintage Airstream. Above is the relaminated kitchen and bedroom of a 1948 Wanderer. The Wanderer will be at the International Contemporary Furniture Fair at the Javits Convention Center. Retailers may go Saturday through Tuesday; the public, Tuesday only, $25; (800) 272-7469.
